title: 20.1 Preliminary Approaches
content:
Section 20.1

Preliminary Approaches

Summary

Building toward O(log log u) operations on integer keys.

Key Points

  • Universe of keys {0, 1, ..., u-1}
  • Direct addressing: O(1) ops but O(u) space
  • Superimposing binary tree: O(log u) ops
  • Goal: O(log log u) for all dictionary operations
  • Key insight: recursively divide universe into âˆšu clusters

Example

Universe 0-15: divide into 4 clusters of 4 elements each. To find 13: cluster = 13/4 = 3, offset = 13 mod 4 = 1.

Why It Matters

Shows path from simple structures to optimal integer data structure.
